level.heading: Seats to conform to federal safety standards.
level.text: Child restraint seats shall conform to all applicable federal motor vehicle safety standards established pursuant to § 103 of title 1 of the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966, approved September 9, 1966 (80 Stat. 719; 15 U.S.C. § 1392).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-194
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-194, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-1701.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: 15 U.S.C. § 1392, referred to in this section, was repealed in 1994 by P.L. 103-272, § 7(b). For present law, see 49 U.S.C. § 30101 et seq.
